description: "Eleven separate maps of bays and river mouths of Sumatra, including two bays on the island on Bras (Breueh Island), and the bay at Kota Radja (Banda Aceh). Bathymetry (sea depth), anchor points, reefs and shoals are marked, along with tide data."
title: "Ankerplaatsen en mondingen van rivieren op de Noord- en Oostkust van Sumatra"
